name: Thorpe Park
description: Thorpe Park is a theme park located in Surrey, England. It is known for its thrilling rides and attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and live entertainment.

events.name: Halloween Fright Nights
events.description: Experience the park transformed into a spooky wonderland with haunted attractions and scare zones.

events.name: Summer Nights
events.description: Enjoy extended park hours with live music, entertainment, and fireworks.
